body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the set of all positive integers between 1 and 2017, inclusive.  Suppose that the least common multiple of all elements in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"L"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Find the number of elements in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that do not divide "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\dfrac L{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"L = 2^{10} \cdot 3^6 \cdot 7^3 \cdot P,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a product of other prime powers. Then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"L/2016 = 2^5 \cdot 3^4 \cdot 7^2 \cdot P."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" So we are looking for numbers which are divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^6,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^5,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7^3."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" No number "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\le 2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divisible by two of these simultaneously, so we can count each one separately."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\lfloor 2017 / 2^6 \rfloor = 31"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" numbers divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^6,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\lfloor 2017 / 3^5 \rfloor = 8"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" numbers divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^5,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\lfloor 2017 / 7^3 \rfloor = 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" numbers divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7^3,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so the answer is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"31 + 8 + 5 = \fbox{44}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
